settings.copy: Earn points and gain access to exclusive benefits every time you shop

settings.subtitle: GET REWARDED
settings.description: Use your points to redeem vouchers and unlock exclusive benefits when you reach the next level.

settings.title: WHAT IS CLUB FELLA?
settings.description: Club FELLA is our new loyalty program, offering an elevated experience to our members. As you move through the three tiers of our program, unlock new benefits and exclusive offers.

settings.title: HOW DOES IT WORK?
settings.description: Club FELLA offers 3 Tiers of recognition. You ’ ll earn Points on each full - price purchase you make, which will help you move through our tiered program. For every $1 spent on full - price products, you ’ ll receive 1 Point. Your Points balance will determine which tier you sit in . As you reach new tiers, you ’ ll unlock new benefits and have 12 months to maintain your tier status.

settings.title: HOW DO I EARN POINTS?
settings.description: Earn 1 Point for every $1 spent on full-price products on fellaswim.com

settings.title: WHAT CAN I DO WITH MY POINTS?
settings.description: Points allow you to progress through the tiers of our loyalty program, as you move up tiers, you’ll gain access to new benefits and rewards.

settings.title: HOWDO I JOIN?
settings.description: New and existing FELLA customers can join Club FELLA simply by creating an account and logging into their loyalty page.

settings.title: WHO CAN JOIN?
settings.description: Anyone can join! You must be 18 or over, if you are under 18 years old, a parent or guardian must read and accept the terms and conditions on our T&Cs page.

settings.title: HOW DO I CHECK MY TIER?
settings.description: You can stay up to date on your Points balance and tier status by logging into your Club FELLA account.

settings.title: WHAT HAPPENS IF I CANCEL AN ORDER?
settings.description: If you cancel an order, your Club FELLA account will not accrue points for this purchase.

settings.title: I AM ALREADY A CUSTOMER, DO MY PREVIOUS ORDERS COUNT TOWARD MY POINTS?
settings.description: To get you started, we will back date purchases from 1st October 2023. Simply login to your account, using the same details you’ve used to check out on the Club FELLA page to view your status.

settings.title: WHY HAVE I GONE UP A LEVEL?
settings.description: If you’ve moved up a level, it means you have earned enough Points in the last 12 months to qualify for a higher tier status.

settings.title: WHY HAVE I GONE DOWN A LEVEL?
settings.description: If you’ve gone down a level, it means you have not met the qualifying Points balance by the expiry date to maintain your level or go up a level. After entering a tier, you’ll have 12 months to enjoy your Club FELLA benefits and maintain your Points balance.

settings.title: WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS?
settings.description: As a Club FELLA member, you’ll gain early access to new products and sales, be eligible for loyalty exclusive promotions and more.
